DOMDocument.versionInfo: Saved by Adobe Flash Macintosh 11.0 build 489

p.span: Your name is Xiao, you are a worker at the electronic factory Foxconn in China, Shenzhen.
Your salary is only half of the cost of living which forces you to work overtime, a lot of overtime!
Whatever you do, keep up your production quota, avoid breathing in poisonous chemicals, ask no questions and stay in line!

Actionscript.script: var snd:GameSound = new GameSound(); snd.play(0, int.MAX_VALUE); frame1.addEventListener(MouseEvent.CLICK, function(event:MouseEvent):void { gotoAndPlay('frame2'); });
